name: W.Z.R.D. mkIII
description:
W.Z.R.D. mkIII by Sam McGuire
for the Spring 2021 Game Jam with Tennessee Tech University's Game Development Club.

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys = Move
Z Key = Fire
X Key = Time Jump 

TIME DEMONS FROM THE FUTURE HAVE ARRIVED TO DESTROY THE PAST, OUR PRESENT.
THE GREAT TIME WIZARD MERLIN THE THIRD, FORESEEING THE ARRIVAL OF THE TIME DEMONS, TRAVELS TO THE FUTURE TO CYBERNETICALLY ENHANCE HIS MAGIC.
TRAVELING BACK TO THE PAST, BUT ALSO TO HIS FUTURE, MERLIN MUST BATTLE THE DEMONS TO SAVE OUR FUTURE FROM A DOOMED PAST.

ONWARD, PROJECT W.Z.R.D!!!!!!!!
